title: How Real Change Can Come to #MeToo
description:
It has been one year since the New York Times published its first article detailing decades of alleged sexual misconduct against Harvey Weinsten. David speaks to Bloomberg News diversity reporter Jordyn Holman on what has changed over the past year...and what hasn't. 
FOLLOW UP
 Jordyn latest report: #MeToo’s First Year Ends With More Than 425 Accused
You can follow Jordyn at: @JordynJournals
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
